alert.note: Alert for Garland; Montgomery (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 8:48AM CDT until April 16 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Garland County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 848 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Mount Ida, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain Pine... Lake Ouachita State Park... Rockwell... Avant... Crystal Springs Landing... Mt Tabor... Sunshine... Fannie... Royal... Lena Landing Rec Area... Silver... Hamilton... Hempwallace... Crystal Springs... Story... Washita... Hurricane Grove... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
